dict.string: Zero needs access to your calendar to add events from your emails, such as school events, meetings, and appointments.
Zero will add events to your calendar based on the emails you receive.
Zero uses speech recognition to transcribe your voice input when composing email replies.
Zero needs microphone access to enable voice-to-text input for composing email replies.
Zero needs access to create reminders from your emails so you never miss important tasks.
Zero can save contact information from your emails to make it easier to reach people.
Zero uses Siri to let you check your inbox, reply to emails, and complete actions with voice commands.
